abstract: Microsoft and other major Internet companies are changing their privacy policies in the face of regulatory scrutiny.
snippet: Microsoft and other major Internet companies are changing their privacy policies in the face of regulatory scrutiny.
lead_paragraph: There’s nothing like a little regulatory scrutiny to get Internet companies talking about privacy. Even if some of their words ring somewhat hollow.
